title: Online Support Specialist  Work from Home (Earn Up to PHP 15,000 + Bonuses!)
job_overview:
Hiring Now – No Experience Needed! Training Provided!

Are you tech-savvy and love helping people online? We’re hiring Online Support Specialists to assist customers via chat, email, and social media—100% work from home!

? What You’ll Do:

Respond to customer inquiries on Facebook, Instagram, and online stores

Guide users on product purchases, tracking, and refunds

Update records and manage basic data entry tasks

? Requirements:

Basic computer/mobile skills (browsing, typing, MS Office/Google Docs)

Familiar with Shopee, Lazada, or Amazon? Big plus!

Good English communication (written)

???? Salary: PHP 15,000 – 20,000/month + high bonuses!
? Flexible shifts (must be available 5 mins every 20 mins for responses)
???? Paid training! No BPO experience? No problem!

Apply now—start ASAP! Easy hiring process!
